techmeme.title: Ted Sarandos says Netflix talent uses "AI tools to do set references, pre-vis, VFX sequence prep, shot planning" and AI can make movies "10% better" (Dade Hayes/Deadline)

Insiders, including tech execs, say President Trump's trade war may hinder the US computing industry by raising costs for building chip fabs and AI data centers (Financial Times)
A look at ways AI is being used to cut carbon emissions: calculating fuel-efficient driving patterns, monitoring grid infrastructure, and more (Coco Liu/Bloomberg)
China's Q1 2025 smartphone shipments grew 3.3% YoY to 71.6M units; Xiaomi led with 18.6% market share, Apple was the only foreign brand in top 5 with 13.7% (IDC)
